title: Firefox for Android 53.0.2 Release

notes.note:
Prevent video corruption on affected devices ([Bug 1360626][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1360626

Right-to-left locales will now display the search bar correctly ([Bug 1358089][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1358089

Fix for issues with Android integration ([Bug 1320072][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1320072

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
